title: Starter Story Scraper Input
description: Configuration for scraping case studies from Starter Story

sessionCookies.title: Session Cookies
sessionCookies.description: Cookies from your authenticated Starter Story session. Get these from browser DevTools > Application > Cookies

maxCaseStudies.title: Max Case Studies
maxCaseStudies.description: Maximum number of case studies to extract

delayBetweenRequests.title: Delay Between Requests (ms)
delayBetweenRequests.description: Delay between page requests in milliseconds. Higher = more respectful

startPage.title: Start Page
startPage.description: Page number to start from (for resuming)

industries.title: Industries Filter
industries.description: Only scrape specific industries. Leave empty for all.
